docs.snippet: Are Prince Amukamara's struggles typical of a rookie being asked to do too much, or is there cause for more concern?...
docs.abstract: Are Prince Amukamara's struggles typical of a rookie being asked to do too much, or is there cause for more concern?

docs.lead_paragraph: Toward the end of Coach Tom Coughlin's news conference Sunday, a reporter asked for his assessment of the rookie cornerback Prince Amukamara. Coughlin hesitated. Then he said, "It seemed like they threw the ball in that direction and we were not having a lot of success."
docs.snippet: Are Prince Amukamara's struggles typical of a rookie being asked to do too much, or is there cause for more concern?...
docs.abstract: Are Prince Amukamara's struggles typical of a rookie being asked to do too much, or is there cause for more concern?

docs.snippet: A closer look at China's foreign-language Oscar submission after its star, Christian Bale, was attacked by government-backed guards....
docs.abstract: A closer look at China's foreign-language Oscar submission after its star, Christian Bale, was attacked by government-backed guards.

docs.lead_paragraph: The outlook for China's  foreign-language Oscar submission, "The Flowers of War," has been complicated by the government-backed attack, last week, on the film's star, Christian Bale. But even before the assault, which took place when Mr. Bale tried to visit a dissident in a remote village, the film was considered an unusual prospect, as our colleague Larry Rohter writes. Read more »

headline.main: Gas Leak Prompts Warranty Extension for 80,000 Honda Civic Hybrids

docs.snippet: Honda called the leaks minor and said a recall to replace gas tanks on unaffected models was not necessary....

headline.main: Firefighter Seriously Burned in House Fire in Brooklyn

docs.snippet: The firefighter, who was burned on 40 percent of his body, including his head, was talking and alert but has “a long road ahead” of him, an official said....
docs.abstract: The firefighter, who was burned on 40 percent of his body, including his head, was talking and alert but has “a long road ahead” of him, an official said.

docs.lead_paragraph: Updated, 2:45 p.m. | A firefighter was hospitalized with serious burns to 40 percent of his body from a fire in a brownstone in Crown Heights, Brooklyn, on Monday morning, Fire Department officials said.

headline.main: Firefighter Seriously Burned in House Fire in Brooklyn

headline.main: Even as Zynga Slides, Bankers Reap Big Fees

docs.snippet: While shares of the online game company continued to fall on Monday, Zynga's underwriters, including Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs, shared $32.5 million for handling the I.P.O....
docs.abstract: While shares of the online game company continued to fall on Monday, Zynga's underwriters, including Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs, shared $32.5 million for handling the I.P.O.

docs.lead_paragraph: Investors who bought into Zynga's initial public offering last week received no respite on Monday.
